attributes.action: Change world friendship day in England to September 23rd.
attributes.additional_details: This iconic moment shaped the tennis world and showed the world what true friendship really means.
attributes.background: Federer and Nadal shaped the tennis world.  But off the court, the two share nothing but respect, admiration and a great friendship. So when Federer and Nadal were next to each other for their last match they weeped as Federer bids adieu to the sport, it was an emotional but a memorable moment.

rejection.details:
Parliament / UK Government is not responsible for creating national awareness days. Anyone can create a national awareness day. 

You almost must provide your full name when starting a petition.
